titles.title: Congratulating Martin Strel of the Republic of Slovenia for his historic athletic achievement as the first person to swim the length of the Mississippi River.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 9/17/2002--Introduced. Congratulates Martin Strel of Slovenia for being the first person to swim the length of the Mississippi River. Commends Strel for dedicating his swim (that he called the Eye to Eye Project) to the victims and heroes of September 11, 2001. Recognizes the Project for promoting friendship between the United States and Slovenia.
